name: Yu-Ju Lee
bio: I build production-grade systems across the stack: embedded platforms, backend services, and cloud infrastructure.

Over the past decade, my work has ranged from wireless systems in production silicon to backend platforms serving 22B+ transactions, and to cloud data pipelines on Google Cloudâ€”building end-to-end systems across layers. I hold a PhD in Computer Science, with research in ML-driven system automation.
